tool_description:
Enter your city and zip code below to find the combined sales tax rate for a location. If you’d like to calculate sales tax with product exemptions, sourcing logic, and shipping taxability, use our sales tax API.

telegram DM: https://t.me/justmobicode
name: Sales Tax Calculator
title: Sales Tax Calculator

api_list.name: Supported Countries
api_list.description: Returns a list of supported countries.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sales-tax-calculator2.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sales-tax-calculator2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sales-tax-calculator2.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sales-tax-calculator2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Calculate
api_list.description: Retrieves tax rates applicable to a specific address. This endpoint accepts address inputs to deliver up-to-date, relevant local tax rates instantly.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Set to one of the countrie codes listed in Supported Countries.
